title: Apple, rocket and feta buckwheat galettes
description: Try these sugar-free savoury pancakes for a healthy supper or as an alternative to traditional Pancake Day crêpes.This meal provides 490 kcal, 13g protein, 35g carbohydrate (of which 13g sugars), 33g fat (of which 20g saturates), 4g fibre and 2.5g salt per portion.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 green apples, peeled, cored, chopped into 3cm/1¼in chunks
freshly ground black pepper, to taste
